channel.title: Arga?
channel.description:
Wtf is it? Loads of people are like:
"z0mg! Dont give out ARGA! We cant give it to anyone!"
But iBot says to download it... WTF is going on? :p

item.title: Arga?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:19, topic:52885”][quote author=Taios link=topic=74482.msg837114#msg837114 date=1170052028]

Hmph, Taios. If I thought knowing a small bit of Java would work, I’d’ve very recently, yet you require proof that we help people. That, I’m sure, is a common problem, and it killed me.

Well were trying to wean out good members from bad. For example those that spam questions without thinking and those that try and then ask questions. Those that generally help people, and those that will only help if there is something in it for them.

Its not about java knowledge, its more about the person, java examples, scar examples, php, or watever just shows to us, ‘Hey this person tries’, if someone can post like loads of links to them helping people out it shows us ‘this person may not be knowledgeable but they give what they can’.

Jordon, if you cba to find links to yours posts. I cba to read them. I prefer not to spend HUGE amounts of time searching through each applicant to find if they are or are not a good member.

l335h4x hu r u lewl? I nvr s3en u b34 r u hx0r? :p. Clear evidence rs-resources is not filled with um…newbies? lol
[/quote]

So if you know or are learning java and are really trying does this mean you can get in? Is it the same with php?[/quote]

Any language, doesn’t necessarily have to be programming either. HTML doesnt overly count as a good thing though lol.

Yea killer your brother is pretty smart :). Basically like if you are in SRL, its more evident that you really have tried, clearly or you wouldn’t be in that position. You have worked for that position :).

Read full topic

item.title: Arga?
item.dc:creator: @killer-christian killer-christian
item.description:
@killer-christian wrote:

yeh i think they are’nt taking apps in for a bit i applied to i have made a script for the original arga V 4 lol so old but it works for that version here it is [code]import com.ms.arga.common.;
import com.ms.arga.hooks.;
import com.ms.arga.sal.;
import javax.swing.;

public class GiantSpider extends SALScript {
public String getName() { return “GiantSpider”; }
private int Kills = 0;
boolean inCombat = false;
boolean firstRun = true;
String user = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(“Username”);
String pass = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(“Password”);
public int cycle() {

  if(firstRun) {
     setup();
  }

  if(!loggedIn()) {
     login(user, pass);
  }
  if(loggedIn()) {
  if(inCombat) {
     if(getMyPlayer().getInteractingChar() == -1) {
        inCombat = false;
		return random (700, 500);
  	}
  }
     try {
        if(getMyPlayer().getInteractingChar() != -1 ||
           getMyPlayer().isMoving() != 0) {
              return random(300, 700);
        } else {
           atNPC(getNearestNPCByName("Giant spider"), "Attack");
           inCombat = true;
           Kills++;
           wait(2000);
           log("______________________________");
           log("Giant Spider Killer Edited by KillerChristian");
           log("Killed " + Kills + " Giant Spiders");
           log("______________________________");
           return random (1000, 2000);

        }
                 } catch(NullPointerException e) {
		            log("Walking");
					walkPathMM(DEATH_PATH, 10);
  }
     return random (1000, 2000);

}
return random (1000, 2000);
}

public void setup() {
log(“Starting Giant Spider Killer”);
firstRun = false;
}

public boolean dead() {
	return distanceTo(new Tile(3230, 3219)) < 20;
}

private static final Tile[] DEATH_PATH = {new Tile(3230, 3219), new Tile(3232, 3227), new Tile(3227, 3234), new Tile(3219, 3237),
		new Tile(3211, 3238), new Tile(3204, 3244), new Tile(3196, 3245), new Tile(3188, 3245), new Tile(3181, 3249),
		new Tile(3173, 3248)
};

}
[/code]
Its old but it worked i made it form some basic code and code i made i made the walk back to so it works for a while fairly flawless i managed to make walk back before my brother who is fairly high in the ranks of RSR but doesnt give me anything to od with RSR he says i should work up my rank here then aply there.

Read full topic

item.title: Arga?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:3, topic:52915”][quote author=Taios link=topic=74482.msg837191#msg837191 date=1170052491]

Lawl dont worry, auto banning system soon, we will catch you before the person whom its leaked to has the rs client even loaded.

lol @ open source having banning

Lol, try us.

If we can stop people whom are downloading ARGA via remote. We can certainly do it by other means. Have you not noticed? Not all class files are open source? Hmm lets thing. o i noes, jagex’s client.
[/quote]
oic, so you plan to change the client so it checks whos loading it, and the changes are being made by an open source app. makes sense to me[/quote]

LOL. wtf? Its open source, of course people are going to edit it, that’s the point, they increase their knowledge by it. Also that’s unnecessary work.

Read full topic

[/quote]
lol @ open source having banning[/quote]

Lol, try us.

If we can stop people whom are downloading ARGA via remote assistance, aka directly off someones computer whom is a legit rs-resources user. We can certainly do it by other means. Have you not noticed? Not all class files are open source?

Read full topic

item.title: Arga?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Silver Lining, post:7, topic:52885”][quote author=Taios link=topic=74482.msg836920#msg836920 date=1170050082]

but unfortunatly if you have no coding skills or are just the average online joe then you wont get accepted. and if your a leecher then you for sure wont get accepted.

No. If you prove you have tried to learn some programming and have not done copy/pasting job, or you have tried at something else. You get accepted. We like to think ARGA as a reward or learning tool. We don’t want idiots & leeches in rsr. We want people whom try to learn. We therefore don’t get the forums completely spammed with silly spammy questions ‘omg rs updated what do i do?’ - Kaitnieks was spammed with at least 3 topics every rs update with regards to Aryan not working.

Its great :D.

Lawl dont worry, auto banning system soon, we will catch you before the person whom its leaked to has the rs client even loaded.
[/quote]I love how you made it and it’s relatively easy for one to insert the hooks as you guys did, however, I’ve been doing so for my bot and, I must say, making an autoupdater is no easy task. 218 lines to inject 2 methods :P[/quote]

<3

If you can convince me you have tried and want to get into rsr for learning exp. Yes mjordon. However ‘i am planning to learn java soon’ or ‘when i get around to it’ wont do it, did you know 85% of the pms i receive, say that?

Read full topic

mjordan:

but unfortunatly if you have no coding skills or are just the average online joe then you wont get accepted. and if your a leecher then you for sure wont get accepted.

No. If you prove you have tried to learn some programming and have not done copy/pasting job, or you have tried at something else. You get accepted. We like to think ARGA as a reward or learning tool. We don’t want idiots & leeches in rsr. We want people whom try to learn. We therefore don’t get the forums completely spammed with silly spammy questions ‘omg rs updated what do i do?’ - Kaitnieks was spammed with at least 3 topics every rs update with regards to Aryan not working.
